config.neo4j.topic.cypher.algod_indexer_public_: FOREACH (x IN CASE WHEN event.typeenum = 1 THEN [1] ELSE [] END | MERGE (snd:Account{account: event.txn_snd}) MERGE (rcv:Account{account: event.txn_rcv}) CREATE (snd)-[:PAYMENT {txid: event.txid, amount: event.txn_amt, fee: event.txn_fee, blockNumber: event.round, intraBlockNumber: event.intra, closedSndAccountTx: event.txn_close}]->(rcv) ) FOREACH (x IN CASE WHEN event.typeenum = 2 THEN [1] ELSE [] END | MERGE (snd:Account{account: event.txn_snd}) MERGE (partNode:ParticipationNode{participationNodeId: 0}) CREATE (snd)-[:KEY_REGISTRATION {txid: event.txid}]->(partNode) )
